DOC.brief_title: Patellar Taping Proprioceptive Exercises Young Women With Patellofemoral Pain Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study assess role patellar tap muscle activation seven proprioceptive exercise woman patellofemoral pain syndrome . Forty voluntary young woman ( 18 35 year ) three clinical symptom patellofemoral pain syndrome recruit . The participant answer clinical questionnaire regard knee pain specific patellofemoral questionnaire title : Anterior Knee Pain Scale ( AKPS ) . All participant sign inform consent form approve North Parana University Ethics Committee Research Human Subjects . The sample randomized two group : ( G1 ) experimental group use rigid patellar taping ( n = 20 ) correction lateralization patella stabilization knee . The lateral stabilization make self-adhesive taping position lateral border patella tensioned relation medial portion femur condyle , allow edge medial board patella stretch lateral structure knee . All procedure follow recommendation McConnell study regard patellar femoral syndrome ; ( G2 ) placebo group use rigid patellar taping ( n = 20 ) , without correction lateralization patella and/or stabilization knee . The taping place incorrectly vertical position knee without tension traction around structure patella . A computer use generate randomization sequence participant . The allocation print card sequentially number opaque envelope . Before perform exercise , maximum voluntary isometric contraction perform knee extensor muscle ( e.g . specifically VMO VL ) hip abductor muscle ( e.g . GM ) order normalize signal EMG determine level muscular activity exercise , correct tap and/or placebo . All participant , randomization , perform seven proprioceptive exercise one leg-stance position different surface : 1 ) static position force platform , 2 ) dynamic flexion-extension knee force platform , 3 ) anteroposterior sway rectangular rocker board , 4 ) mediolateral sway rectangular rocker board , 5 ) unipodal stand swing apparatus , 6 ) unipodal stand mini-trampoline , 7 ) unipodal stand bosu balance ball . Each exercise time 15 second performance , sway centre pressure parameter compute ( exercise # 1 # 2 ) , EMG surface recording ( VMO , VL , GM ) seven . First , one baseline measure ( without tap ) perform immediately use tap ( intervention placebo ) . An ANOVA two-way perform compare two group ( G1 G2 ) two time ( immediately tap ) effect interaction ( Groups x Times ) . The size effect also compute determine rate change observe .
